body_html: You would get to avoid building graph for things that are not just_those_vars. It would probably also make it simpler to design a new context-manager API to optimizer which takes care fo this for you.
body_text: You would get to avoid building graph for things that are not just_those_vars. It would probably also make it simpler to design a new context-manager API to optimizer which takes care fo this for you.
body: You would get to avoid building graph for things that are not `just_those_vars`. It would probably also make it simpler to design a new context-manager API to optimizer which takes care fo this for you.
